mapper.select: SELECT id, sender_id, open_chat_room_id, message, type, is_deleted, deleted_time, created_time FROM open_chats WHERE open_chat_room_id = #{openChatRoomId} ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT open_chats.id, open_chats.open_chat_room_id, open_chats.message, open_chats.type, open_chats.is_deleted, open_chats.deleted_time, open_chats.created_time, u.id as sender_id, u.nickname as sender_nickname, u.profile_image as sender_profileImage FROM open_chats INNER JOIN users as u ON u.id = open_chats.sender_id WHERE open_chats.open_chat_room_id = #{openChatRoomId} AND open_chats.created_time < #{lastCreatedTime} ORDER BY open_chats.created_time DESC LIMIT #{limit}
